question:
[Mickey] was disappointed that his father, [Chuck], would n't be at the play to see him perform. [Chuck] took his son [Mickey] to the park to feed the squirrels. [Sara] and her mother [Chuck] made breakfast together. [Elizabeth] and her daughter [Sara] went to see a movie yesterday and then got ice cream afterwards. [Spencer] was playing checkers with his brother [Reynaldo]. [Spencer]'s sister [Elizabeth] was waiting to play. [Leandro] was disappointed that his father, [Chuck], would n't be at the play to see him perform.
Question: How is [Reynaldo] related to [Leandro]?

By following these steps, you can analyze the relationships mentioned in the story and infer the relationship between Reynaldo and Leandro.
